meanings.definition: A swollen area within body tissue, containing an accumulation of pus.
meanings.sent1: The doctor drained the abscess to relieve the pressure.
meanings.sent2: She had to go to the hospital to treat the abscess on her arm.
meanings.sent3: The abscess on the tree trunk looked like a big pimple.
meanings.sent4: The abscess of corruption in the government needed to be addressed.
meanings.sent5: The abscess throbbed with pain, making it hard to ignore.
